ConceptDef.label: Guest beds
ConceptDef.helpText: Visitors prefer to sleep in beds.\n\nYou can convert beds to guest beds using the "For guests" button.

ConceptDef.label: Recruiting guests
ConceptDef.helpText: You can recruit guests.\n\nRecruiting a guest will cost you goodwill with the guest's faction. Make sure you have a colonist with good social skills assigned for negotiation.

ConceptDef.label: Guests help out
ConceptDef.helpText: Happy guests will help with work inside of their area if they are skilled enough. You can disable this or raise the required skill in the mod options.
